website_summaries.verdict: An extremely lightweight, odorless mousse that gradually foams as you cleanse.
pros: Easily rinses off makeup and sunscreen at the end of the day
cons: A little goes a long way for especially dryer skin types

customer_reviews.title: maybe it's just me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me - after a couple of days of washing, I noticed I started having bumps/acne - not sure if it's this product but it's one different thing I have been using. Also, just to note that this does not leave the "clean feeling" - it's like a lotion that you wash off. Maybe it could be good for you - for it's price, try it out yourself and send your experience for everyone else to benefit from. hopefully it works out for you, but I wont be buying this again unfortunately :(
customer_reviews.author: Tango C

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of oil cleansers but this stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of oil cleansers but this stuff feels oily going on, doesn't lather, and doesn't rinse clean. Doesn't remove makeup.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaAmber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry the delicate skin on my mug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st facial cleanser that does not strip my face of all it's natural oils! Usually every dang cleanser makes my sensitive dry acne prone skin tight and flaky after I let it air dry. I don't have that issue with this cleanser. It has a good balance between cleansing and moisturizing the face. My issue is trying to locate stores that still carry this product!? It's getting harder and harder to find??! Makes me wonder if it's being discontinued???🤔
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marmolejo

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My face is smooth & my complexion ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My face is smooth & my complexion is so much better! Dove is acnes secret!!! Im 35 & I wish I'd known about this - it's definitely a life changer for me at my age. THANK YOU DOVE!! 🐦 The order said a week for delivery - it came in 2 days! Ill definitely be ordering again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Overall... Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. I'm used to using exfoliating types of face wash. This one almost feels like rubbing lotion on your face. I find that I have to use extra to get that "clean" feel. It's ok on moisture and easy on acne prone or sensitive skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa White

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Hard to wash off of skin. Did not do a great job taking make up off at all! It’s an okay face wash if you don’t have any makeup or sunscreen on and just want to do a light wash before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Morrow

customer_reviews.title: not seems to be a face wash
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't wash your face, it is more like putting cheap cream to your face. Will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: T. Sen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and it works pretty good on his face
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without Drying
customer_reviews.text: Dove DermaSeries wash is perfect for my skin - it cleans without drying or allergic reaction. Just a small amount on a wet washcloth is all that I need, twice per day.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hagler Wong

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: If you use this every day you will see how acne starts to Disappear I use it at night and in the morning to clear my skin
customer_reviews.author: gabriel and Allie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Dermatologists suggested this product to help control the dry skin ... with acne medication. Works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. It makes my skins soft. Never drys me out
customer_reviews.author: Faith 11

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Different then any other face wash I have had. Leaves skin feeling greasy right after but once it is dry I don’t notice any extra oil.
customer_reviews.author: kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash, leaves my face feeling very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Quiqui

customer_reviews.title: Uncluttered usability
customer_reviews.text: Even if I use it, it does not refresh. There is a feeling of use of greasyness like applying a little cream.
customer_reviews.author: AKI

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Description
customer_reviews.text: Deceiving description. It says it is a 2 count for 11.99, but I only received one. The product is wonderful, but I was expecting a 2-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This is too greasy; did not suit my skin. Not satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: March

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is great unless you have super sensitive skin like I do. It worked well but unfortunately caused me to have a bit of a redness reaction
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have very very dry skin it cleans my skin nicely and does not leave it oily. I would recommend to rinse your face well and not use hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: It might be a good face wash, however it didn't take makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Kehm

customer_reviews.title: gentle face wash
customer_reviews.text: This face wash has been great. In the winter I really need a moisturizing soap and this has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom as she has a dry skin. She liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The best face wash! My skin has cleared up so much from small Rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Rashunica Holland

customer_reviews.title: TRIAL AND ERROR
customer_reviews.text: I love all dove products. This product just made my skin oily. Trial and error!
customer_reviews.author: Brienna Prudencio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was a gentle cleanser for my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product for my extremely dry and broken out skin. It us the best face wash I have ever purchased or used.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money....
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this cleaner cleans the face well. It feels like I am rubbing lotion all over my face and then rinsing it off. I do not get the clean feeling when I am done rinsing the product off my face. I had high hopes for Dove because I use all of their products but they definitely failed here.
customer_reviews.author: Clik Clak 22

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive and dry skin. This product is works great on my face, very moisturizer and not irritating like other soaps and cleansers. Update: I just received my order and found just one of the product and not two as stated. Are they now charging the price of two, for one? Not happy and I requested a refund. I’ve been ordering this product for over a year and received two of the Dove DermaSeries Fragrance Free Face Wash pack. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Not oil free for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It has petroleum and mineral oil in it. I used it once and the next day I had white heads all over my face and my eyes were irritated. I have very sensitive skin and should have looked at the ingredients they consider sensitive because any dermatologist I've talked to recommends oil free for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as god as bar soap
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the bar soap. Need to add thev1/4th moisturizing cream.
customer_reviews.author: Ask About Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Won't use anything else. Really makes your sink so soft. Even my husband is using it now. Ordered more😇
customer_reviews.author: Hut513

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wash
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, feels like lotion, doesn’t form at all, leaves a thick film on the skin
customer_reviews.author: A. Brazhnykova

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer feel
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. I still wash my face before because this has such a lotion feel that it doesn't seem to clean my face well. I like it but prob won't buy again. Feels more like putting on a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: christy m pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Only facial wash I can use
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that my skin can tolerate. Everything else dries out the skin.
customer_reviews.author: crazymom

customer_reviews.title: Cera ve but cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This came with two smaller bottles. Wow thanks. Love it. It feels clean and refreshing after first use. Love that it’s comparable to cera ve
customer_reviews.author: ChelliE

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Ponds but you rinse off instead of tissues
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your skin very soft, really soft. Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I have this on a subscription because my loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett W.

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Gentle cleanser. Feels silky on the skin. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hill Fam

customer_reviews.title: Not happy needs more improvement
customer_reviews.text: I tried this face wash it is ok but plays foaming fragrance free face wash makes my skin feel refreshed and does not dry out my skin
customer_reviews.author: Picasso42

customer_reviews.title: Skin does not suffer that soapy dryness and tautness.
customer_reviews.text: Skin does not feel drawn and immediately dry as it did even with Cetaphil and similar brands. However I attribute much of the overall success to the Skin Balm of the same series which I put on immediately after using this product so I don't have an exact idea of how it would have worked by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle

product_meta.title: Dove DermaSeries Fragrance-Free Face Wash, for Dry Skin, 8.45 Fl Oz, Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Size:8.45 Fl Oz, 2 Count| Style:Gentle Cleasing Face WashDove DermaSeries dry skin relief gentle cleansing face wash Looking for a gentle daily face wash for dry skin? Dove DermaSeries dry skin relief gentle cleansing face wash is a soap-free cleanser with a unique blend of skin-natural lipids and mild cleansing actives that offers creamy care for dry, delicate skin. Use the Dove fragrance free, hypoallergenic face wash every day to gently remove impurities and improve visual dryness. It is one of the best facial cleansers for dry skin from Dove. Creamy, gentle cleansing for extremely dry skin From the makers of the #1 dermatologist recommended skin cleansing brand for dry skin, the Dove DermaSeries face wash is 100% free of cleansing surfactant, non-foaming and ultra-mild. It has a unique emollient combination to seal in moisture without greasiness and is clinically proven to significantly improve the quality of skin over time. The creamy consistency allows you to use with or without water. Beautiful-feeling skin starts with care. How to use This hypoallergenic, fragrance-free face wash gently removes impurities while deeply moisturising your skin. - Lather Dove fragrance-free face wash in your hands and apply on wet face in circular motions, or apply it on dry face with a cotton round. - Rinse your skin before patting dry. Repeat every morning and evening. - Complete your regimen with Dove DermaSeries replenishing face cream. Care for your body too with Dove DermaSeries body wash and lotion.
feature_bullets: The best Dove face wash for severely dry skin
Hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, non-irritating Dove face wash
Creamy, gentle cleansing for extremely dry skin
Creamy face wash for very dry skin, tested with dermatologists
